items.title: Student Who Shot 2 Others at Colorado School Was ‘Radicalized,’ Officials Say
items.summary: Desmond Holly, 16, who is suspected of shooting and injuring two students, had been “radicalized by an extremist network,” the authorities said.

items.title: Security at Kirk Event Seemed Light to Those Who Attended
items.summary: The problem of protecting campus speakers with polarizing opinions has confounded universities around the country in recent years.

items.title: Investigators eye a hunting rifle for clues to the gunman’s identity and motive.
On Ukraine and Gaza, Trump Casts Himself as a Bystander, if He Can’t Be a Peacemaker
items.summary: President Trump often insists he can bring peace to global conflicts. But when allies and adversaries alike appear to be ignoring him or testing American will, he adopts a what-can-you-do shrug.

items.title: For National Guard Troops in D.C., It’s Trash Pickup and Metro Patrols
items.summary: Thousands of armed troops are deployed as part of President Trump’s crime crackdown. So far, it has been a lot of beautification projects and assisting the local police.

items.title: FBI Releases Photos of Person of Interest in Charlie Kirk Shooting
items.summary: The grainy images show a man wearing a baseball cap, dark sunglasses and a black long-sleeve shirt with an image on it that appears to include, in part, a picture of the American flag.

items.title: Charlie Kirk shooting latest: FBI shares photos of person of interest and offers reward for information
items.summary: <p>FBI offers $100,000 reward for information about suspect after finding ‘high-powered bolt action rifle’ in wooded area</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-police-search-for-suspect-amid-condemnation-of-targeted-killing">Full report: Hunt for suspect who fatally shot Charlie Kirk continues</a></p></li><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/10/charlie-kirk-shooting-what-we-know">What we know so far</a></p></li></ul><p>A <strong>UK</strong> offshoot of a <strong>US</strong> conservative group set up by <strong>Charlie</strong> <strong>Kirk</strong> is to hold a vigil in <strong>London</strong> after he was shot dead, reports the PA news agency.</p><p><strong>Turning Point UK</strong> has said its activists will gather on Friday evening by the <strong>Montgomery statue</strong> in <strong>Whitehall</strong> and called on others to “join us in remembering Charlie”.</p><p>It’s absolutely shocking, we’re heartbroken over here in the UK.</p><p>My thoughts this evening are with the loved ones of Charlie Kirk.</p><p>It is heartbreaking that a young family has been robbed of a father and a husband.</p><p>Political violence has no place in our societies.</p><p>Our thoughts and condolences are with his family.</p><p>An atrocious murder, a deep wound for democracy and for those who believe in freedom.</p><p>My condolences to his family, to his loved ones, and to the American conservative community.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shot-latest-news-updates-utah-university-donald-trump">Continue reading...</a>

items.title: Charlie Kirk shooting: FBI says weapon found as hunt for suspect continues
items.summary: <p>Rifle found in wooded area where shooter fled as Trump says he will award Medal of Freedom posthumously to Kirk</p><ul><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shot-latest-news-updates-utah-university-donald-trump">Charlie Kirk shooting: latest updates</a></p></li><li><p><a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-maps-videos-images">How the Charlie Kirk shooting unfolded – in maps, videos and images</a></p></li></ul><p>The sniper who <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/10/charlie-kirk-shot-utah">killed</a> the rightwing activist Charlie Kirk is believed to have jumped off a roof after firing one shot and fled into a nearby neighborhood, and has not been identified, authorities in Utah said on Thursday.</p><p>Officials said they had recovered a high-powered bolt-action rifle they believe was used in the attack and are reviewing video footage of a suspect.</p> <a href="https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2025/sep/11/charlie-kirk-shooting-police-search-for-suspect-amid-condemnation-of-targeted-killing">Continue reading...</a>
